comment._content:
I am looking forward to this exhibition. Annie Leibovitz has a curator's eye. Thank you for sharing. And say hello to Mr. Lehman, he's now vice chair of CIG. 

Cassandra Soler (formerly CIG Coordinator for Studio Museum in Harlem)

comment.author: 47898188@N00
comment._content:
She is my all time favorite.
I just was at her book signing on South Beach this past week.
I have had the opportunity to photograph her 11 years ago at a photo shoot she was doing for VOGUE of my boss at the time, Laurinda Spears.
Feel free to check out the images.
:)
